SELECT * FROM PLAN_VIEW WHERE (cp_name = #{productName} OR #{productName} IS NULL) AND (plan_deta_id = #{planNo} OR #{planNo} IS NULL) AND (emp_name = #{writer} OR #{writer} IS NULL) ${statusFilter} ORDER BY plan_deta_id

SELECT a.type, a.PLAN_HEAD_ID, b.MAT_ID, c.CP_name, b.deta_qt, b.good_qt,a.plan_due_date, TO_char(b.START_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS start_date, TO_char(b.END_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS end_date, b.MEMO FROM PROD_PLAN a left JOIN DETA_PROD_PLAN b ON a.PLAN_HEAD_ID = b.PLAN_HEAD_ID left JOIN COMPLETE_PROD c ON b.MAT_ID = c.CP_ID ORDER BY a.plan_deta_id
SELECT a.ORD_ID, a.BUS_ID, c.BUS_NAME, a.ORD_DUE_DATE, a.ORD_DATE,a.ORD_STAT FROM SORDER a LEFT JOIN DET_ORD b ON a.ORD_ID = b.ORD_ID LEFT JOIN BUSINESS C ON a.BUS_ID = c.BUS_ID
